page.title: 06Law and Order
page.content: The main police stations for the area are Marsh lane,which is in Bootle and Crosby Road North in Waterloo.The Maghull Traffic Unit deals with all traffic matters. The local police deal with the normal police duties including the supervision of the Orange Lodge annual march on July 12th.,and crowd control at Everton and Liverpool Football Grounds. The "dock police" have been successfully involved in apprehending drug smugglers. South Sefton Magistrates Court,sitting in the former Police Court in Bootle,serves our area.The four courts and a juvenile court sit every working day and are served by 130 J.P's. The most common offences are concerned with traffic or non-payment of fines. Walton Prison is in our area.
